description: Fix column 1 to exactly 30 cells wide, redistributing freed space evenly between columns 2 and 3

userStories.title: Fix column 1 width to 30 cells
userStories.description: As a user, I want column 1 to always be 30 cells wide so that the layout is consistent and columns 2/3 get more space at wider terminals.
acceptanceCriteria: Add a constant Col1Width = 30 in tui/layout/columns.go
Modify ComputeColumnWidths so column 1 is always Col1Width (30) in all multi-column layout branches
In three-column mode: after allocating 30 to column 1 and subtracting 2 border characters, split remaining width evenly between columns 2 and 3
In two-column mode (col3 hidden): after allocating 30 to column 1 and subtracting 1 border character, give all remaining width to column 2
When terminal is too narrow to support 30-cell column 1 plus usable columns 2/3, switch to mini-player mode
Adjust Col3HideThreshold if needed for sensible column 3 show/hide breakpoint with fixed column 1
Update the ComputeColumnWidths table in tui/TUI-ARCHITECTURE.md (lines 101-106) to reflect the new fixed column 1 width and revised sizing rules
